snippet: Tim Byrdak, a left-handed pitcher for the Mets, is expected to undergo surgery Tuesday in New York to repair a torn meniscus in his left knee.
abstract: Tim Byrdak, a left-handed pitcher for the Mets, is expected to undergo surgery Tuesday in New York to repair a torn meniscus in his left knee.

byline.original: By BARRY MEIER and PETER KERASOTIS

headline.main: Alderson Updates Injuries to Byrdak and Wright
